pli-tv-pvr1.7:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, through how many of the seven principles for settling legal issues are they settled?
pli-tv-pvr1.7:1.3: they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted; or they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass. …
pli-tv-pvr1.7:2.1: When it comes to the offense for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, through how many of the seven principles for settling legal issues is it settled?
pli-tv-pvr1.7:2.3: it may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted; or it may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr1.7:3.1: The seventh section on settling is finished.
